description:
Beh and Nora get trapped inside an abandoned car on the riverbank. Flyers are posted on street corners looking for the missing Beh. On a rainy day, the car, with the two cats still in it, begins to slip toward the water...
Pochi is labelled a genius for his ability to discern the difference between types of tofu and becomes a neighborhood star! His owner is proud of him and flattered by all the coverage in newspapers and TV shows. Meanwhile, Pochi grows less and less energetic, wishing he could play with Tama and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bee ga Ippai / Tensai Pochi no Densetsu
So Many Behs / The Legend of Pochi the Genius
ベーがいっぱい / 天才ポチの伝説
